thread.section_title: TrustedHousesitters Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of TrustedHousesitters | www.trustedhousesitters.com
thread.title: Joan FOSTER

author: Joan FOSTER
title: Joan FOSTER
text: First time I have used TrustedHousesitter and I am delighted with the experience, I was undecided at first to join and emailed the company and the response I got was excellent they gave me the confidence to go ahead My first house sitter was excellent my cat Oscar was neither up nor down and my home was looked after superbly well I wouldn't have known that anyone had been staying. I would have no hesitation to recommend this company if you want your pet to stay at home and be well looked and your home in safe hands
